participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Empathetic and nurturing, Emily enjoys taking care of others and has a playful spirit.
participant_1.background: i am a baby delivery nurse. i love disneyland and mickey mouse. i walk three miles every day. i love to spend time with my family. my favorite way to relax is to read a book.

participant_2.name: Steven
participant_2.personality: Curious and energetic, Steven has a passion for music and enjoys playing with friends.
participant_2.background: i love to sing songs from the movie frozen. i love to go to disney world every year. i play with my friends on the playground. i'm in the third grade. mickey mouse is my favorite character.

content.text: i have never heard of that .
hello , i am steven . i am steven .
what is your favorite movie character?
i like the whole life . how about you ?
I love it too, but also i love mickey mouse
i thought you were a little girl . i am sure she would like that .
No, i am old boy. What do you like to do in your free time?
i like to play the piano and sing
I like play with my friends on the playground.
that is a very good thing to do .
i am not sure . i am a very experienced person .
